transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji namaste.
Executive: Namaskar bete, main bol rahi thi abhi aapki na unse baat hui hogi Rahul ji se.
Customer: Ha mam abhi nahi hui hai. Dopahar mein mam kisi se hui thi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Unhone kaha tha ki whatsapp ke jariye contact karke dekhte hain hum unhe samne wali party ko.
Executive: Nahi actually aapka jo concern tha na wo sab aage team ko bhi aaya hai. To us team mein se jo Rahul ji hain wahi aapka case handle kar rahe hain. Unhone aapko call nahi kiya abhi tak?
Customer: A mam mujhe naam yaad nahi hai dopahar mein ek call aaya hua tha unhone kaha tha ki main unhe contact karke dekhta hu fir main aapko batata hu. Tab se fir koi contact hua nahi hai.
Executive: Ha to wo shayad aapka wahin se aaya hoga Rahul ji se. Rahul ji ne hi aapko call ki hogi. Aapne call receive nahi ki thi kya?
Customer: A pehli baar call receive nahi ki thi jab maine dobara mam maine call back kiya to call receive ho gayi thi.
Executive: Achcha achcha tab bol rahe the. Ha to abhi na aapka jo concern hai wo aage chala gaya legal team ko wo apne aap handle karenge aapko directly Rahul ji hi connect karenge. Agar aaj ka phir sham tak to aapke paas number to aa hi gaya hai unka hai na? Okay okay mam. Ha agar aapki kuch bhi baat hoti hai to ya to wo khud aapko call karenge nahi to aap unhe call back kar lena. Aur jo mere paas aapka concern aaya hua hai fir wo main close kar du?
Customer: Hmm mam close se kya hone wala hai mam jaise wo log to apna kaam karenge na.
Executive: Ha wo to apna karenge kyunki meri side se to ab to mere end pe to wo kaam reh hi nahi. Mere end pe tha aapki query lena aur aage tak jo aapka issue hai uska resolution ke liye aage bhejna. Wo maine apni side se kar diya ab jo aapka sara iska matlab ye nahi hai ki agar meri side close ho gaya to aage team work nahi karegi. Team to work karegi hi karegi. Ab aapke paas mera bhi number hai aur legal team ka bhi hai.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: To ab aapko koi ha to aapko dono mein se kisi cheez ka bhi koi issue hi nahi aayega.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Ha to ye aap pe depend hai aapko koi mail aayega aapke paas to aap us mail pe bhi na kar dena aur baki maine aaj aapke kuch products vagera bhi update kiye hain. Kisi kisi mein maine photos vagera bhi add kiye hain aapke catalog mein.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Ha aur baki to ek baar main bhi connect karke dekhungi dobara se jinse aapki kal baat matlab Mahendra Prasad ji jo hai wahi bata rahe the na?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To Mahendra ji ne aap se Mahendra ji ne aap se ye kaha tha ki main isme involve nahi hu mere naam se koi aur kar raha hai. Mahendra ji ne kaha tha aap se?
Customer: Mam maine apne jo logo se malum kiya tha ab jisne mere sath kiya hai usne apna naam Mahendra ji bataya hai aur jo dukandar hai wo bhi Mahendra ji naam se hain.
Executive: Wo kis naam se hain?
Customer: Jisne mujhe mere maine jis party ko payment kiya hai. Jis number pe maine baat ki thi sabse pehle jis number se mujhko call aaya aur message aaya. Jisne mujhe bill bana ke bheja aur maine jis jis pe payment kiya usne apna naam Mahendra Prasad bataya Janvi Enterprises se.
Executive: Ha ha ha ha.
Customer: Aur jab maine pata kiya waha pe ki Janvi Enterprises se firm bhi hai aur Mahendra Prasad hi chala rahe hain.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Ha. To ab samne matlab ye bhi confirm ho gaya ki samne koi Mahendra Prasad hi hai. Matlab mera meri baat sahi hai waha tak. Ab jab main payment us jagah dal deta hu aur tab fir malum mujhe chalta hai ki matlab Mahendra Prasad kehte hain ki matlab us jagah main nahi hu. Meri jagah koi aur Mahendra Prasad ban ke baat kar raha hai aur Janvi Enterprises koi aur koi aur keh raha hai ki Janvi Enterprises koi aur chala raha hai use.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Contact dono ke dono ke contact alag alag hain. Ha contact number. Ab contact number main waha pe waha pe samne samne to baithe nahi hain. Hmm. Ab samne wale ka mujhe aapka number IndiaMART ka through mil raha hai aur main IndiaMART ke alava koi dusra other platform use karta nahi hu.
Executive: Karte nahi ho ha.
Customer: Mera trust bana hua hai mera trust Mahendra Prasad se nahi bana na Janvi Enterprises mera trust bana tha IndiaMART ke through. Hmm. Ki IndiaMART baitha hai beech mein hum dono beech mein to kahin na kahin genuine hi party hogi. Ha. Par iske piche ye baat aa rahi hai. Ha to aap
Executive: Aap mujhe ek baar ye verify karo ki jo aapke father bata rahe the ki jo aapke paas jo dairy vagera hai jo location ka area tha waha jinke through inhone baat karai thi unhone apna naam kya bataya tha?
Customer: A kisne mam?
Executive: Jo aapke father bata rahe the ki jo aapka ye tha Bhind MP wala jo wo dhokla karke kuch inka area tha na? Ha ha. Dhokla ha to ki maine apne sutron se pata lagwaya aapke father bata rahe the. Ha. Kisi ke through ha kisi ke through information ke liye baat kari thi to unhone kya naam bataya tha apna?
Customer: Mam jiske dwara maine pata lagaya unka naam jaanna hai ya matlab party ka naam jaanna hai. Nahi nahi party ka party ka Janvi ke alava jo inhone baat kari hai Janvi wale ko hum side mein kar dete hain ha.
Executive: Party ka naam mam udhar Janvi Enterprises karke firm hai ek aur uska GST number jispe maine jispe maine payment deke kiya hai na jispe maine GST number ko dekh ke payment kiya hai same GST number udhar hai aur waha pe ek aadmi jo kaam kar raha hai wo bhi Janvi Enterprises karke Mahendra Sao Mahendra Pratap kaam kar rahe hain.
Customer: Ha ha wo same hai.
Executive: Mahendra Pratap karke ek vyakti hai Janvi Enterprises karke ek firm hai aur GST number jis jispe maine dekha tha ki is GST number pe firm hai aur wahi GST number waha pe registered hai. Ha. Ye pura same hai sirf matlab number number dono ke contact number difference hai aur chehre difference hai. Ha. Aur baki ka sab same hai.
Customer: Thik hai to main aaj aaj ki date mein mam jaise kaam kar raha hu main. Mere IndiaMART ke catalog pe jo product hai wo to hai hi. Hmm. Iske alava maine aapko bataya kuch aise hi product hai jinke agar order mujhe aate hain to main wo bhi share karta hu. Ha. Par wo maine product IndiaMART pe nahi lage hue hain. Par main share to kar raha hu na. Hmm. Samne wali party deal jispe agar confirm jaise Ashwagandha root hai. Mere isme Ashwagandha root laga hua hai aur powder ka nahi laga hua hai par main powder bhi supply kar raha hu. Hmm. Par ab jaruri to nahi hai ki main powder nahi rakh raha hu ya nahi kar sakta hu. Wo main karta hu milta julta item hai. Isi prakar anaj anaj ke sath ilaichi dono ek sath chal sakte hain. Ab wo samne wale ka hai ye involvement ya nahi hai uska hume nahi idea. Par kahin na kahin thik hai. Mam main connect karke dekhti hu kaise bhi agar ho pata hai baki aapka connection legal team se jyada rahega aap unko call karenge wo aapko call karenge thik hai?
Executive: Okay mam.
Customer: Are jo number aapne mujhe diya tha main apni side se jispe dobara connect kyunki kal to main call receive nahi kar raha tha main aaj fir se karke dekhti hu sham tak karungi thik hai? Aur abhi jo aapke concern hai main apni side se ab to close kar du?
Executive: Mam kar dijiye aur kya bataye mam ab iska nahi to meri ye chahiye ki mere main to maan jaunga. Nahi nahi meri side se close hoga sirf meri side se close hoga samne wali team jo aapko handle karegi waha se nahi hoga. Sirf meri side se to waise bhi koi matlab nahi hai aapka sirf main legal team hi dekhegi.
Customer: Okay mam kar dijiye. Ya mam agar agar jaise issue nahi banna ho wo cheez ka to kuch din chal sakta hai kya?
Executive: Nahi aisa kuch nahi hai meri side se to waise bhi kuch nahi hona. Jo meri side ka kaam tha wo maine apne end se kar diya hai aapko mere paas agar concern chala rahega tab bhi koi us pe koi wo nahi agar jaisa koi problem nahi aa raha ho aapko personally to kuch din ke liye ho sakta hai ki bana rahe do se teen din ke liye bas. Do se wo to banne ko to kabhi tak bana rahe sakta hai lekin mere mam sirf do se koi baat nahi sirf mam do se teen din tak agar bana rahega agar police bhi mujhse agar puche verification to main keh to sakta hu mam ha meri taraf se abhi chalu hai ye. Wo kahenge aapne ye band karaya hai ya ha ya na kal ya mujhe parso tak time chahiye bas. Chalo main dekhti hu ek baar manager ko puch leti hu thik hai? Okay mam. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with Mahendra Prasad.

- Wants to keep the issue open for 2-3 days.



Resolution:

- Executive assured legal team will connect.

- Executive updated customer's product catalog.

- Executive will try to connect with Mahendra Prasad.

- Executive will check with manager about keeping open issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call customer by evening.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, payment, catalog, legal team, products
